price: ߞߏߘߏ߲߰ߣߍ߲ ߣߴߊ߬ ߟߊ߲ߞߣߍߡߊߣߍ߲ ߟߐ߲ߓߊ߮ ߟߋ߬ ، ߊߟߊ߫ ߞߘߐߕߊ߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߜߙߊ߬ߟߌ߬ߝߋ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߞߟߋ߫
arabic: عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ فَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ʿālimi al-ghaybi wal-shahādati fataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
